Function reference

epiparameter classes

epidist object

Class constructor, validator, and methods

epidist()
Create an <epidist> object
discretise() discretize()
Discretises a continuous distribution in an <epidist> object
as.function(<epidist>)
as.function() method for <epidist> class
family(<epidist>)
Family method for the <epidist> class
format(<epidist>)
Format method for <epidist> class
get_citation(<epidist>)
Get citation from an <epidist> object
get_parameters(<epidist>)
Get parameters from an <epidist> object
mean(<epidist>)
Mean method for <epidist> class
plot(<epidist>)
Plot method for <epidist> class
print(<epidist>)
Print method for <epidist> class
validate_epidist()
Validator for <epidist> class
get_citation(<multi_epidist>)
Get citation from a list of <epidist> objects
print(<multi_epidist>)
Print method for <multi_epidist> class

vb_epdist object

Class constructor, validator, and methods

vb_epidist()
Create a <vb_epidist> object
format(<vb_epidist>)
Format method for <vb_epidist> class
plot(<vb_epidist>)
Plot method for <vb_epidist> class
print(<vb_epidist>)
Print method for <vb_epidist> class
validate_vb_epidist()
Validator for <vb_epidist> class

Accessors

Get data from epi classes

get_citation()
Get citation from an object
get_parameters()
Get parameters from an object

epidist helper functions

Functions to help construct <epidist> objects

create_epidist_citation()
Create a citation for an <epidist> object
create_epidist_metadata()
Specify metadata associated with data set
create_epidist_method_assess()
Specify methodological aspects of distribution fitting
create_epidist_region()
Specify the geography of the data entry
create_epidist_summary_stats()
Specify reported summary statistics
create_epidist_uncertainty()
Specify distribution parameter uncertainty

epidist from {epiparameter} library

Retrieve <epidist> object directly from database

epidist_db()
Create <epidist> object(s) directly from the epiparameter library (database)

Explore epiparameters

List epi parameters as table

list_distributions()
List epidemiological distributions stored in the epiparameter library

Distribution functions

Functions for operating on <epidist> and <vb_epidist> distributions

density(<epidist>) cdf(<epidist>) quantile(<epidist>) generate(<epidist>) density(<vb_epidist>) cdf(<vb_epidist>) quantile(<vb_epidist>) generate(<vb_epidist>)
PDF, CDF, PMF, quantiles and random number generation for <epidist> and <vb_epidist> objects

Parameter extraction

Extract distribution parameters from summary statistics

extract_param()
Calculate the parameters of a parametric probability distribution from reported values of percentiles, or median and range

Parameter conversion

Convert distribution parameter to summary statistics and vice versa

convert_params_to_summary_stats()
Convert the parameter(s) of a distribution to summary statistics
convert_summary_stats_to_params()
Convert the summary statistics of a distribution to parameters

Epi object checking

Check an object is of a certain type or feature

is_epidist()
Check object is an <epidist>
is_epidist_params()
Check whether the vector of parameters for the probability distribution are in the set of possible parameters used in the epiparameter package
is_truncated()
Check if distribution in <epidist> is truncated
is_vb_epidist()
Check object is a <vb_epidist>
is_parameterised() is_parameterized()
Check if <epidist> or list of <epidist> objects contains a distribution and distribution parameters

Utility function

calc_disc_dist_quantile()
Calculate the quantiles of a probability distribution based on the vector of probabilities and time data (e.g. time since infection)

On this page
